"abstract"=>"<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif; text-align: justify;\">This is an abstract.<em>&nbsp;</em></span></strong><em><span style=\"font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif; text-align: justify;\">It will contain bold and italic text.&nbsp;</span></em></p>\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif; text-align: justify;\">Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. </span></strong></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><em><span style=\"font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif; text-align: justify;\">Underlined text.&nbsp;</span></em><span style=\"font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif; text-align: justify;\">It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. </span></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif; text-align: justify;\">Some will contain superscript:<sup> Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia,</sup> looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. </span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif; text-align: justify;\">Some will contain subscript:&nbsp;</span><sub><span style=\"font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif; text-align: justify;\">Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of \"de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum\" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. </span></sub></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif; text-align: justify;\">Some will contain strikethroughs:&nbsp;</span><span style=\"text-decoration: line-through;\"><span style=\"font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif; text-align: justify;\">This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, \"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..\", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.</span></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif; text-align: justify;\">Some will be in code:&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 15px; padding: 0px; text-align: justify; font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif;\"><code>The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from \"de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum\" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.</code></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 15px; padding: 0px; text-align: justify; font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif;\">Some will be in blockquotes:</p>\r\n<blockquote>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 15px; padding: 0px; text-align: justify; font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif;\">There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable.</p>\r\n</blockquote>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 15px; padding: 0px; text-align: justify; font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif;\">&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 15px; padding: 0px; text-align: justify; font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif;\">Some will have muiltple styles applied:<em><strong> If you are going to use</strong></em> a passage of Lorem Ipsum, <strong><sup>you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text</sup></strong>.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 15px; padding: 0px; text-align: justify; font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif;\">&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 15px; padding: 0px; text-align: justify; font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif;\">&nbsp;</p>"
